item.title: Player Beard + Chick player
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Here Ill take a shot at this beard thing.
Im player.java add this below the ‘player look’ list

pBeard=14;[/code] then under Default Appearance add [code]public int pBeard;

Then add this under if (isNpc == false) {

if (!Item.isFullMask(playerEquipment[playerHat]) && (playerLook[0] != 1)) playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard); // Beard else playerProps.writeByte(0);

that might not work but it could.

item.title: Player Beard + Chick player

item.description:
@mathew000000000 wrote:

my question is this lol

How to make the loading problem go away, when i log off im a man and when i log in im a chick

and about the beards i need to put this somewhere

[code]if(playerLook[0] == 0)
playerProps.writeWord(0x100 + pBeard);
else
playerProps.writeByte(0);
} else {
playerProps.writeWord(-1);
playerProps.writeWord(npcId);

	}[/code]

i have the public int.

but when i change my beard its not there
